overview: Mr. Caccappolo has spent his career building and improving businesses by designing and implementing technology application and optimizing operations. He has focused on the internet areas of content publishing, e-commerce, interactive and community features and digital monetization since 1999. Before joining oneTXT, Mr. Caccappolo was President of Creative Commerce, LLC, an investment and advisory firm. Prior to that, Mr. Caccappolo was a member of the senior management team at iVillage Inc., part of NBC Universal. During his tenure he managed technology, commerce, international operations, business development and e-marketing. Prior to joining iVillage, Mr. Caccappolo served as the Chief Information Officer of Kodak Polychrome Graphics, the Director of Information Technology for Sun Chemical Europe and a senior manager of Andersen Consulting (now Accenture).
